text_block_list.text: One day, while training in preparation for an upcoming race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa……… fuu.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: My time has gotten better, hasn't it? In addition to that, it feels like I catch my breath a little bit faster after running.
choice_data_list: We're making good progress through the menu too!
We're making good progress through the menu too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Well then- to make the best use of time, I will continue.
As soon as I praise her, she returns to thinking about training. Just like she said, she was making use of that time. Her concentration was incredible.
choice_data_list: That concentration is one of your stengths
That concentration is one of your stengths

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Strength, is it? …Oh, no. While I'm honored you think that, I've never given it much thought before. I'm just… a little surprised.
Looks like she hasn't really given it much thought before. This is probably one of the strongest factors behind her resolve―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: As I'm sure you're already aware. …I was born with a frail, extremely weak body.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: There's no telling when my body will break down. It's even possible that in the brilliant history of the Mejiro family, or even that of Uma Musume, I may quickly be forgotten.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Quickly fading, or quickly forgotten. -Even still, "Right now".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Right now, in this moment, to shine brilliantly even at the cost of my life, is the one right still permitted me.
On that day, of her own volition, she explained her situation to me, quietly… but there was an unwavering determination within.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, my preparations are complete. I'm ready for the last one, please.

text_block_list.name: Spectating Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: -Eh? How many of those has Ardan-senpai done? -She's doing more training than before isn't she? Is her body okay?
From the nearby spectating kouhai, I heard some voice their concern, but―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…… ……Yeah, this feels fine…
choice_data_list: (It's fine, she can still keep going)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san? Is there something wrong?
choice_data_list: In this condition, I wonder if adding more would be fine

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……! Absolutely, please do. I think I want to keep running a bit more, too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: For today too, thank you very much. Today's training, was much more fruitful than before I believe.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: That's why… if it's alright. Starting tomorrow, how about making this the normal training menu?
choice_data_list: I was thinking the same thing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh! …Fufuu. I guess I have to be thankful for "now". Lately, it seems like my condition has gotten better. I don't get so feverish I can't move anymore.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Before my debut, I wasn't able to train on consecutive days. However, now, it's as you can see.
With her in good health and high spirits, our meeting ended. But, it didn't seem she was ready to relax just yet, as she was still standing straight.
choice_data_list: Why don't you relax a bit more?
Why don't you relax a bit more?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Relax… what do you mean?
choice_data_list: How about sitting down or laying on the sofa?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh, thank you very much. However, staying like this feels a bit more natural for me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Originally, the Mejiro family girls tend to be in the public view pretty often. To prevent any careless mistakes, from a young age they are taught etiquette. Furthermore―

text_block_list.name: Female Acquaintance
text_block_list.text: Oh, Ardan-chan, why are you in that corner? Are you, perhaps, feeling unwell?

text_block_list.name: Young Ardan
text_block_list.text: No, Auntie. I was just thinking about something…

text_block_list.name: Female Acquaintance
text_block_list.text: You shouldn't force yourself. You've got such a frail body after all……!

text_block_list.name: Young Ardan
text_block_list.text: (……I see. I should stand properly, otherwise they might think I'm feeling sick…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: No, it's nothing. Staying like this helps calm me down, so please don't worry.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, I'll promise not to push myself too hard when you're around, so please, rest assured.
choice_data_list: Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know
Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh… if you were to pamper an Uma Musume, wouldn't it interfere with your work, Trainer-san?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Perhaps I might say: "Today, I'm not feeling too good so I'm going to take the day off." Something like that, you know?
choice_data_list: N-Not when it comes to training!
N-Not when it comes to training!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Fufuu… of course, I ask that you don't. I'll be fine, right now I've been more than taken care of.
choice_data_list: (If she's going to say that, I'll leave it to her…)

text_block_list.text: After seeing Mejiro Ardan with a refreshed smile on her face, I decided not to say anything more.
